en: Narrator: It is a bright sunny day. Peppa and her family are in the park. They are going to fly a kite.
cn: 旁白：今天天气晴朗，佩奇和她的家人在公园里。他们要放风筝。

en: Narrator: George is going to fly the kite first.
cn: 旁白：乔治要先放风筝。

en: Narrator: George runs as fast as he can. But the kite won’t fly.
cn: 旁白：乔治尽力跑得很快，但风筝飞不起来。

sentence.en: run as fast as he can

examples.en: throw the ball as far as you can
jump as high as you can

en: Peppa Pig: George, you’re doing it all wrong. You didn’t run fast enough. Now it’s my turn.
cn: 佩奇：乔治，你做错了，你跑得不够快。现在轮到我了。

en: Narrator: Peppa runs as fast as she can. But the kite still won’t fly.
cn: 旁白：佩奇尽力跑得很快，但风筝还是飞不起来。

sentence.en: But the kite still won’t fly.

examples.en: But the ball still won’t bounce.
But the car still won’t start.

en: Daddy Pig: The kite won’t fly if there isn’t any wind, no matter how fast you run.
cn: 猪爸爸：如果没有风，风筝怎么跑都飞不起来。

points.en: no matter how fast you run

en: Peppa Pig: Oh.
cn: 佩奇：哦。

en: Mummy Pig: We just have to wait until the wind picks up a bit.
cn: 猪妈妈：我们得等风大一点。

sentence.en: wait until the wind picks up a bit

examples.en: wait until the sun comes out

en: Peppa Pig: Oh.
cn: 佩奇：哦。

en: Peppa Pig: Look, it’s getting windy.
cn: 佩奇：看，风大起来了。

en: Narrator: Now that it is windy, the kite can fly.
cn: 旁白：现在有风了，风筝能飞起来了。

en: Narrator: The wind is quite strong now.
cn: 旁白：现在风很大。

en: Narrator: The wind is very strong now.
cn: 旁白：风越来越大了。

en: Peppa Pig: George!
cn: 佩奇：乔治！

en: Daddy Pig: Peppa!
cn: 猪爸爸：佩奇！

en: Peppa Pig: Thank you, Daddy.
cn: 佩奇：谢谢你，爸爸。

en: Narrator: Daddy Pig flies the kite.
cn: 旁白：猪爸爸在放风筝。

en: Peppa Pig: Higher, higher.
cn: 佩奇：再高点，再高点。

en: Narrator: Daddy Pig flies the kite very well.
cn: 旁白：猪爸爸风筝放得很好。

sentence.en: Daddy Pig flies the kite very well.

examples.en: Daddy Pig drives the car very well.

en: Peppa Pig and George: Wow!
cn: 佩奇和乔治：哇！

en: Daddy Pig: Yes, I am a bit of an expert at these things.
cn: 猪爸爸：是的，这些我很在行。

sentence.en: I am a bit of an expert at these things.

examples.en: I am a bit of an expert at fixing cars.
I am a bit of an expert at cooking.

en: Mummy Pig: Watch out for the trees. You might get the kite stuck in one.
cn: 猪妈妈：小心树，风筝可能会挂在树上。

points.en: get the kite stuck in one

en: Daddy Pig: Don’t worry. I know what I’m doing.
cn: 猪爸爸：别担心，我知道自己在做什么。

en: Narrator: Oh dear. Daddy Pig has got the kite caught in a tree.
cn: 旁白：糟糕，猪爸爸把风筝挂在树上了。

points.en: got the kite caught in a tree

en: Daddy Pig: Oh no.
cn: 猪爸爸：哦，不。

en: Peppa Pig: Oh.
cn: 佩奇：哦。

en: Mummy Pig: Don’t worry, George. Daddy will get the kite down.
cn: 猪妈妈：别担心，乔治，爸爸会把风筝拿下来的。

points.en: Daddy will get the kite down
points.cn: 爸爸会把风筝拿下来的

en: Peppa Pig: Hurrah!
cn: 佩奇：万岁！

en: Daddy Pig: Uh, yes.
cn: 猪爸爸：呃，是的。

en: Daddy Pig: Careful. There’s a big muddy puddle.
cn: 猪爸爸：小心，有个大泥坑。

en: Narrator: Peppa and George love to jump in muddy puddles.
cn: 旁白：佩奇和乔治喜欢跳泥坑。

en: Peppa Pig: Can we jump in the puddle? Please.
cn: 佩奇：我们能跳泥坑吗？求你了。

en: Mummy Pig: No, I don’t want you covered in mud.
cn: 猪妈妈：不行，我不想你们全身都是泥。

en: Peppa Pig: Oh.
cn: 佩奇：哦。

en: Daddy Pig: Stand back, children.
cn: 猪爸爸：孩子们，站远点。

en: Mummy Pig: Please be careful, Daddy Pig.
cn: 猪妈妈：猪爸爸，请小心。

en: Daddy Pig: I know what I’m doing.
cn: 猪爸爸：我知道自己在做什么。

en: Mummy Pig: Please be careful.
cn: 猪妈妈：请小心。

en: Peppa Pig: Just a bit further, Daddy.
cn: 佩奇：再靠近一点，爸爸。

en: Mummy Pig: Daddy Pig, you are much too heavy for that branch.
cn: 猪妈妈：猪爸爸，你太重了，那根树枝承受不了。

sentence.en: you are much too heavy for that branch
sentence.cn: 你太重了，那根树枝承受不了

examples.en: you are much too heavy for that swing
examples.cn: 你太重了，秋千承受不了

examples.en: you are much too heavy for that chair
examples.cn: 你太重了，那把椅子承受不了

en: Daddy Pig: Nonsense. I know exactly how heavy I am. There.
cn: 猪爸爸：别胡说，我知道自己多重。好了。

points.en: I know exactly how heavy I am

en: Peppa Pig: Hurrah!
cn: 佩奇：万岁！

en: Narrator: Daddy Pig has rescued the kite.
cn: 旁白：猪爸爸把风筝救下来了。

sentence.en: Daddy Pig has rescued the kite.
sentence.cn: 猪爸爸把风筝救下来了。

examples.en: Daddy Pig has rescued the kite from the tree.
examples.cn: 猪爸爸从树上把风筝救了下来。

examples.en: Daddy Pig has rescued the ball from the pond.
examples.cn: 猪爸爸从池塘里把球救了出来。

en: Daddy Pig: Whoa!
cn: 猪爸爸：哇！

en: Narrator: Oh dear. Everyone is covered in mud.
cn: 旁白：糟糕，大家都沾满了泥。

en: Daddy Pig: It’s only mud.
cn: 猪爸爸：只是泥而已。

en: Narrator: Luckily, Daddy Pig hasn’t hurt himself.
cn: 旁白：幸运的是，猪爸爸没有受伤。

en: Narrator: And the kite is out of the tree.
cn: 旁白：风筝也从树上下来了。

points.en: the kite is out of the tree

en: Mummy Pig and Peppa Pig: Hurrah!
cn: 猪妈妈和佩奇：万岁！

en: Peppa Pig: Mummy, now that we’re all muddy, can we jump in the puddle?
cn: 佩奇：妈妈，现在我们都沾满了泥，可以跳泥坑了吗？

en: Mummy Pig: I suppose so. After all, you can’t get any muddier. And I think Daddy Pig is going to be doing the washing.
cn: 猪妈妈：我想可以。反正你们也不会更脏了。我觉得猪爸爸要去洗衣服了。

points.en: Daddy Pig is going to be doing the washing

en: Daddy Pig: Oh.
cn: 猪爸爸：哦。

en: Narrator: Peppa and George love jumping up and down in muddy puddles.
cn: 旁白：佩奇和乔治喜欢在泥坑里跳来跳去。

points.en: jumping up and down in muddy puddles

en: Narrator: Mummy and Daddy love jumping up and down in muddy puddles.
cn: 旁白：猪妈妈和猪爸爸也喜欢在泥坑里跳来跳去。

en: Narrator: Everyone loves jumping up and down in muddy puddles.
cn: 旁白：大家都喜欢在泥坑里跳来跳去。

en: Narrator: Jumping up and down in muddy puddles is just as much fun as flying the kite.
cn: 旁白：在泥坑里跳来跳去和放风筝一样有趣。

points.en: is just as much fun as flying the kite
